title: One Piece Episode #513 Anime Review
author: The Fandom Post
description: A detailed review of Episode 513 describing it as 'another piece setting episode' showing how various pirates are responding to recent events. The review notes the episode is balanced by having a Chopper segment dealing with his past and commitment to Luffy.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains discussion of Post-War arc events through episode 516

title: One Piece Episodes 510-513: I Challenge You to a Game of Mancala
author: The Going Merry: A One Piece Review Podcast
description: Podcast episode covering One Piece episodes 510-513, discussing Luffy's shocking return to Marineford, the various Supernova storylines, and character developments. The hosts discuss foreshadowing and analyze the episodes in detail.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Covers episodes 510-513 of the Post-War arc

title: Pirates Get On the Move! Astounding New World! - Crunchyroll
author: Toei Animation
description: Official streaming of One Piece Episode 513, available with both subtitles and English dub. The episode was simulcast on September 3, 2011 in the US, one day before the Japanese broadcast.

title: CHAOS IN THE NEW WORLD?? BLACKBEARD - One Piece Episode 513 Couples Reaction & Discussion
author: Couples React
description: Reaction video and discussion of One Piece Episode 513, focusing on the chaos in the New World and Blackbeard's appearance.

title: ONE PIECE EPISODE 513 REACTION!
author: According to Lucky
description: Patreon-exclusive reaction content for One Piece Episode 513.

title: ONE PIECE Episode 513 REACTION (FULL)
author: Allonsyyy
description: Full reaction video to One Piece Episode 513, available exclusively on Patreon.
